body:
So, what's the most embarrassing thing that happened to you?

Mine happened just a couple of days back. I was at my gym period at school, and it was just ending. We were all crowding at the door to let us back in from outside. My friend happened to be there with some of his friends. Well, he just recently broke his ankle, but that's not the point. Anyway, suddenly, he slaps my butt (he does that a lot). I'm stunned for a second, giving him time to pants me. The worst part about it was that everyone in my gym period was there to see (if not the people around me) and....

My Crush

Great, now I have some things to deal with.

But anyway, what's the most embarrassing thing that happened to you?

replies.body:
+1

Weenie hur general* to be precise.

Well one time was talking to this girl (just a friend...) in front of a bunch of people and I mixed up my words, I meant to say "how do you sleep at night" or "I can't look at you anymore"
But i decided to say them both at the same time and I accidentally said, "I can't sleep with you anymore"

Now my friends including her poke fun at me for saying it XD

replies.body:
Eh.. .-.

Happened yesterday. Me and Jozz really like to share nightcore over Skype, but sometimes he sends me tons of links of songs I like :)
But yesterday, I was in school, and I forgot to put my phone on the do not disturb mode, and right when the lesson started, Jozz decided to send me around 10 songs, but here comes the embarrassing part. I brought MLG to my school. So I decided to set my message ringtone to "OH BABY A TRIPLE OH YEAH", and then Jozz messages me all of these songs and the teacher is like, there is no reason to laugh! And right 2 seconds after it OHVBABY A TRIPLEEE PH YEAH scrims all over my class 10 times..XD

replies.body: This happened to me a week ago. So I was falling asleep as I read a book, as you do and eventually did fall asleep. Mind you, this was IN school. Anyways, I was dreaming and stuff when I suddenly wake up and I was surprised when I still at school, but someone two tables across from where I was, walked up to me and asked "Are you asleep Warbry/irlname?" From there I woke up but I panicked so I just said "Nope." From there I just Wtf'd at the fact I fell asleep during class.

replies.body: I just remembered another one. At my school I told 2 kids which girl I like.. I invited them to my birthday party. Obviously when we are in the car to get back home  (My 2 friends and my step dad are in the car) One of them whispers to the other person something about the girl I like.. Then I say "What?". Then they said "Wait do you like x or x again?" and my stepfather heard that and I don't like him so it bothered me a lot and embarrassed me.

replies.body:
I was in France once on a school trip, (bear in mind I speak little to no French) and I walk into a toilet clearly labeled Men's. Upon entering the toilet and locking the door behind me, I hear the main door open and some feminine giggles coming from outside the toilet. I panic, I finish my business and walk out to see 4 middle-aged French women staring at me looking scared out of their minds. But then, to make matters worse, I make eye contact with one as I walk out, and for some reason I smile. It must have been the creepiest looking smile, because this woman goes gasping into the toilet I was just in.
And I forgot to flush.

Also, is it bad that I've read every single one of the posts on this thread?

replies.body:
Mine would be...

When I was walking around, minding my own business, when I noticed a bunch of people staring at me and snickering. I discreetly looked down at myself, and noticed that somehow, my bra strap had come undone and was poking out my sleeve.

I turned a deep red, and walked away to the bathroom. My hand holding my arm like I was injured.
